version_description:
- Added the barometric pressure to the hourly forecast.
- Added and arrow that represents the barometric pressure trend over the next hour.
- Minimal/Some profanity filter modifications so that sayings make more sense.
- Fixed the truncated loading screen text as a fix for longer sayings.
- Updated SDKs for iOS 13 compatibility that you probably won't notice.
- Fixed a crash in iOS 9 when web links are clicked.
- Updated GDPR/CCPA compliance.
- Fixed the Air Quality Index page scrolling.
- The Privacy Policy and Terms of Use now link to the policies on the Night Cat website.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.
- Fixed a weird glitchy digital background noise. It was a very stupid noise if you didn't get to hear it or notice it.

- Made the widget font size adjustable to work with longer weather sayings.
- Added Ava and Alex Siri voices to the Voice Controls in the app Settings.
- Updated the FAQ to include instructions for downloading the Ava and Alex Siri voices.
- Removed some dumb code that wasn't needed. It was very dumb code.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.
- Made the app 100% gluten free. Pretty cool, right?! Be gone, glutens!!

- Added Visibility to the current and daily forecasts.
- Added the UV Index to the current and daily forecasts.
- Reworked the Extend Loading Screen setting times.
- Updated some text formatting that you probably won't notice. It's way better now, I promise.
- If the current forecast values are null, the app uses the first hourly forecast values instead.
- Some crash fixes because crashes make people sad.
- Forecasts for cities in Mexico that have the same name are now more accurate.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.
- Finally forced to make iOS 10.0 the minimum iOS version to use the app.
- Some other minor changes that I can't remember, because I'm dumb. Hooray!

- Fixed a scroll issue that occurs on some devices when the Remove Ads purchase has been made.
- Added Visibility to the current and daily forecasts.
- Added the UV Index to the current and daily forecasts.
- Reworked the Extend Loading Screen setting times.
- Updated some text formatting that you probably won't notice. It's way better now, I promise.
- If the current forecast values are null, the app uses the first hourly forecast values instead.
- Some crash fixes because crashes make people sad.
- Forecasts for cities in Mexico that have the same name are now more accurate.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.
- Finally forced to make iOS 10.0 the minimum iOS version to use the app.
- Some other minor changes that I can't remember, because I'm dumb. Hooray!

- Added the chance of precipitation to each Daily Forecast Summary for easy access.
- Added "Calculated" as a new Weather Station Type setting in the app Settings. This provides the current weather from a blend of data, including weather station observations, radar & satellite information, global & regional models, and other proprietary sources.
- Updated the FAQ section to describe the differences between the METAR Only, All Stations, and Calculated choices.
- Added the UV Index definition to the Weather Terms page.
- Fixed a widget issue so that it uses the hourly weather data if the current data isn't available.
- Made it easier to select the Weather Station Type and Weather Station Radius settings in the app Settings.
- Added a Use Hourly Forecast option to the Weather Station Radius setting, because the hourly forecast can be more accurate in some situations.
- Some text and formatting changes you probably won't notice.
- Minor code chances and bug fixes.
- Blah, blah, blah, blah, blah...

- Text formatting changes for iPhone 5/5S/SE.
- Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

- SDK updates for better iOS compatibility.
- Code cleanup that you probably won't notice. Heck, I don't even really notice. The code way cleaner now. I promise.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancement.

- Added smoke weather phrases where appropriate.
- Added smoke to the background when it's in the area.
- Modified the frequency of the fog and wind weather phrases.
- Made the current high/low temps match the daily high/low temps for the current day.
- Added extra moon definitions in the Weather Terms section.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Formatting fixes on the iPad Pro
- When the voice is turned on, the voice starts over every time the main text is tapped.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- New iOS 14 Widget
- Fixed a background color issue in the iOS 13 Widget.
- Fixed sharing screenshots to WhatsApp.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Fixed sharing screenshots to WhatsApp.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- New iOS 14 Widget.
- Background changes for the iOS 10 - iOS 13 widget.
- Fixed the tutorial background picture.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Fixed some widget crashes.
- Removed X-Mode SDK from the app.
- Updated the app Privacy Policy.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Spelling changes.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Fixed a no-connectivity bug that I should have found a long time ago. It was a very stupid bug, but now it's better.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Added SKAdNetwork functionality.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Buttloads of new weather and loading phrases.
- Updated install tutorial.
- New share icon.
- Minor bug fixes and stability enhancements.

- Buttloads of new loading and weather phrases.
- I fixed a stupid mistake that I made. Who knew I made stupid mistakes?!
- Minor bug fixes.
